## QueryIndices.has() method

Check whether the set of Indices selected contain the provided value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
has(value: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string | A index name. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

A boolean value.
